s-1.ptxt: INSPECT FRONT SHOCK ABSORBER ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Compress and extend the shock absorber rod 4 times or more. Check that there is no abnormal resistance or unusual sound during the operation.

item.ptxt: If there is any abnormality, replace the shock absorber assembly with a new one.

atten3.ptxt: When disposing of the shock absorber, see Disposal (See page ).
